title: How to start a script on Roblox - Quora

response.answer_text: In Roblox Studio, you can insert an object and click “script”. I’m not much of a scripted myself, so I often look for the scripts on Youtube or the internet. Try searching for what you want to make on Google or something. You could even check the Roblox forum and blog.
A lot of patience, and a lot a lot of more patience. If you want to know where to get started there’s a lot of helpful tutorials up from YouTubers and Roblox themselves.
